author: Siraphob Thanthong-Knight / Bloomberg
title: Bangkok Bans Alcohol Sales in Attempt to Stop Spread of Coronavirus
description: Thailand’s capital, Bangkok, banned alcohol sales for a week and a half to help prevent social gatherings that could spread the virus that causes Covid-19. The ban applies from April 10 to April 20 and is the metropolitan region’s latest effort to contain a s…
content:
Thailand’s capital, Bangkok, banned alcohol sales for a week and a half to help prevent social gatherings that could spread the virus that causes Covid-19.
The ban applies from April 10 to April 20 and is the metropolitan region’s latest effort to contain a … [+771 chars]
